mapper.select: SELECT sibe.id, co.contract_id, co.record_id, co.supp_id, co.object_type, co.prod_code, co.prod_name, co.contract_tax_rate, co1.prod_brand, co1.prod_spec_type, co.exchange_rate, co.require_date, co.plan_delivery_date, co.comment, co.sort, co.tenant_id, co.del_flag, co.create_user, co.update_user, co.create_time, co.update_time, co.to_record_id, co.capacity, co.unit_id, co.pay_qty, co.invoice_rate, co.invoice_qty, co.to_send_qty, co.to_return_qty, co.contract_price_tax as price_tax, co.contract_price_tax * sibe.qty as amount_tax, ifnull(round(co.pay_rate/co.contract_price_tax * 100,0),0) as pay_rate, sibe.entry_no, sibe.order_detail_id, sibe.qty, sibe.contract_price, sibe.contract_price_tax, sibe.contract_amount, sibe.contract_amount_tax, sibe.contract_price_local, sibe.contract_price_tax_local, sibe.contract_amount_local, sibe.contract_amount_tax_local, sibe.seq_no, sibe.social_no, co1.qty as contract_qty, sibe.pack_no, sibe.send_time FROM stk_io_bill_entry sibe left join contract_object_qty co on sibe.order_detail_id = co.id left join contract_object co1 on co1.id = co.record_id WHERE mid = #{mainId} and sibe.del_flag = '0'

SELECT co.*, sibe.order_detail_id, sibe.qty as has_in_qty, ifnull(srbe.qty,0) as has_return_qty, sibe.qty - ifnull(srbe.qty,0) as max_qty FROM stk_io_bill_entry sibe left join contract_object co on sibe.order_detail_id = co.id left join ( select srbe.bill_detail_id,sum(qty) as qty from stk_return_bill_entry srbe where srbe.del_flag = '0' group by srbe.bill_detail_id ) srbe on sibe.id = srbe.bill_detail_id WHERE mid = #{mainId} and sibe.qty > ifnull(srbe.qty,0) and sibe.del_flag = '0'
